name: l5r-roller
title: Legend of the 5 Rings Roller
description: Roll Legend of the 5 Rings 5th edition dice in the chat window (s,w for skill, r,b for ring): /l5r 3r2s or /l5r r or /l5r 2s or /l5r wwbb or /l5r rrsss. Auto rolls exploding successes and let's you re-roll and keep dice. Also supports FFG's Star Wars and Genesys dice via /gen or /sw using the following dice letters: b (boost), s (setback), a (ability), d (difficulty), p (proficiency), c (challenge), f (force)
author: Bernhard Posselt
